sentence: Nevertheless, Carlson introduced him last week as an honest man,? after which Macgregor pushed more Putin propaganda, arguing he is simply trying to prevent further attempts to influence or change Ukraine into effectively a platform for the projection of U.S. and Western power into Russia.? His subsequent comments about Russia being too gentle? which Rep. Liz Cheney (R-Wyo.)
author: Ryan Bort
title: Fox News' Invasion Expert Is a Trump-Appointed Putin Propagandist Who Thinks Russia Is Being Too Gentle'
